attributes.action: Bring the Banking Villains to Justice
attributes.additional_details:
The British Government should prosecute the people responsible for bringing the British Banking Industry to near collapse. So far none of these people, who justified their enormous salaries because they were "The Best", have been brought to book.

I think the people of this country would like to see the likes of Andy Hornby, Fred Goodwin, Eric Daniels and Victor Blank pay heavily for what they have done.

It appears the so called "Best" are still earning millions whilst the people of this country are paying for their failures!
